info.name: Reminder Templates API
info.description: API collection for testing Workspace Reminder Templates system. Covers all combinations of timing (when), targeting, content types, and delivery channels.

request.description: Get the current status of the background reminder processor including running state, interval, and pending count.
Start the background reminder processor.
Stop the background reminder processor.
Manually trigger the processor to run immediately and process due reminders.
Get all reminder templates for a workspace.

query.description: Filter by status: pending, active, sent, cancelled

request.description: Get reminder templates filtered by status.
Get a specific reminder template by ID.
Delete a reminder template.
Create a reminder that fires at a specific datetime.
Create a reminder that fires after 30 minutes.
Create a reminder that fires after 30 minutes of user inactivity.
Create a reminder using natural language time expression.
Create a recurring reminder that fires every 2 hours.
Create a recurring daily reminder at 9:00 AM.

item.name: Create - When Recurring Weekly (Mon Wed Fri)

Create a reminder targeting a single specific session.
Create a reminder targeting multiple specific sessions.
Create a reminder targeting all sessions in the workspace.

request.description: Create a reminder targeting all sessions except excluded ones.
Create a reminder with direct text content.
Create a reminder with AI-generated content from a prompt.

Deliver reminder through all available channels.

Update the template name.

Update the template timing. This will recalculate nextReminderAt.
Update inactivity-based reminder timestamps when user activity is detected.
Create a template that automatically applies to new sessions.
